welcome.title: Welcome to curious future travelers üåé
welcome.p1: Welcome to our travel blog! Here, we share our favorite spots, itineraries, and discoveries from around the world.
welcome.p2: For several years, we've been traveling the planet with our backpacks, seeking breathtaking landscapes and authentic encounters. Our mission? To inspire you to explore the world differently through our stories and practical guides.
welcome.p3: Whether you're preparing your next trip or simply dreaming of escape, Cap Sur Le Monde is your starting point to new horizons.

about.title: Who are we?
about.subtitle: We are Marion and Cris, two passionate adventurers who made travel their lifestyle. Discover our story and our vision of travel.
about.p1: It all started in 2016 during a trip to Southeast Asia that was supposed to last 3 months... and completely transformed us! We discovered a common passion for adventure, authentic encounters, and breathtaking landscapes.
about.p2: Since then, we've never stopped exploring the world together. Our blog was born from the desire to share our discoveries and inspire other travelers to embark on their own adventures.
about.p3: Today, we continue to travel with the same passion, adapting our adventures to our family life, because exploration has no age!
